lord.of.rome

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • lord.of.rome.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents concept of point, the smallest single element on map or coordinate system.
    Author:
    Carlos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
